label: 松平定信
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1758-1837) Reform-minded [senior councillor of the eleventh shogun Ienari] who mounted what has been called the Kansei Reforms" dedicated to cleaning up what he believed to be the evil influences of Tanuma. [家斉、寛政の改革、田沼意次]"
